# NSTextTable.LayoutAlgorithm

**Enumeration**

These constants, specifying the type of text table layout algorithm, are used with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextTable/layoutAlgorithm-swift.property].

## Declaration

```swift
enum LayoutAlgorithm
```

## Constants

- **NSTextTable.LayoutAlgorithm.automaticLayoutAlgorithm**: Specifies automatic layout algorithm
- **NSTextTable.LayoutAlgorithm.fixedLayoutAlgorithm**: Specifies fixed layout algorithm

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: NSTextTable.LayoutAlgorithm
